thread.title: A2 Milk plans $37m equity raising
thread.title_full: A2 Milk plans $37m equity raising | Business Spectator

author: Dow Jones newswires
title: A2 Milk plans $37m equity raising
text:
The a2 Milk Company said it is seeking to raise $NZ40 million ($A36.7m) of new equity through a fully-underwritten placement to eligible investors.
The placement will commence today and a2 Milk has appointed Goldman Sachs New Zealand as sole arranger, book runner and underwriter for the placement. The offer price will be determined by a bookbuild which has been fully underwritten at a floor price of $NZ0.67 per new share.
It will be followed by a share purchase plan to raise another $NZ3m. The share purchase plan is not underwritten.
Shares are currently in a trading halt and closed Wednesday at $NZ0.72 a share.
a2 Milk, which specialises in products for people with difficulties digesting milk, said the raising would be made to pursue growth opportunities.
